reviewText: I bought this movie for Kim Richards & it was very good; I like the glamour scenes the best, but it was too violent for my taste at the end
Title: Tuff Turf / Under the Boardwalk

reviewText: I bought this DVD for Under The Boardwalk... I used to watch that movie when I was a young boy. If your a surfer, live by the beach, or just have a heart for the beach, this is a movie to see! Haven't watched Tuff Turf yet, but, that will be done shortly! But, Well worth the buy just for Under the Boardwalk!  CLASSIC!
Title: Tuff Turf / Under the Boardwalk

reviewText: love tuff turff,this movie has alot of action,drama,james spader is so cool! kim richards is so beautiful.I really love the acting and plot.I am glad to have it for my personal collection
Title: Tuff Turf / Under the Boardwalk

reviewText: I saw this movie Tuff Turf when I was younger and was very happy to see it available on DVD.  Neat to be able to watch movies I grew up with.  Fast shipping and good product.
Title: Tuff Turf / Under the Boardwalk

reviewText: I got this movie because I was look for one movie that James Spader  did.  This movie "Tuff Turf" was okay, but I would of like to seen more action form James. It made me think of the movie "Rebel Without a Cause", where this kids are always beating him up. He doesn't stand up for himself until the end. As for the other movie it was a waste of time. I found it boring and didn't keep interested.
Title: Tuff Turf / Under the Boardwalk
